devdoc.details: Implementation of the {IERC1820Implementer} interface. Contracts may inherit from this and call {_registerInterfaceForAddress} to declare their willingness to be implementers. {IERC1820Registry-setInterfaceImplementer} should then be called for the registration to be complete.
